notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This research was supported by grants APVV-18-0005 and APVV-16-0026 from the Slovak Research and Development Agency, VEGA 2/0030/20 from the Scientific Grant Agency of the Ministry of Education and Slovak Academy of Sciences and OP Research and Development: Transfer of effective procedures for selection and identification of plants in breeding(ITMS 26220220142) from European Regional Development Fund.
